author: tvami
body:
#### PR description:

Part of the migration in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31061

According to the comment https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31061#issuecomment-987355542 this is the last DB signature for the es get() functions

#### PR validation:

Code compiles

cc @makortel
title: es get() migration of L1CondDBPayloadWriter and L1CondDBPayloadWriterExt
